codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
codeSystems.description: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
codeSystems.description: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceType
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntoleranceType
codeSystems.description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceSubstance/Product,ConditionAndNegationCodes
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Substance/Product, Condition and Negation Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes concept codes for specific substances/pharmaceutical products, allergy or intolerance conditions, and negation/exclusion codes to specify the absence of specific types of allergies or intolerances.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Verification Status.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationFunctionCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Function Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the function a practitioner or organization may play in the immunization event. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationRouteCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Route Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the administrative routes used during vaccination. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

codeSystems.name: CodesForImmunizationSiteOfAdministration
codeSystems.title: Codes for Immunization Site of Administration
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the body site where the vaccination occurred. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the current status of the administered dose of vaccine.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationStatusReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Status Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose of vaccine was not administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
codeSystems.description: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

codeSystems.name: SubstanceCode
codeSystems.title: Substance Code
codeSystems.description: This value set contains concept codes for specific substances. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance)) and where concept is-a 373873005 (Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product))

codeSystems.name: NGClinicalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Clinical Status VS
codeSystems.description: The outcome of the reaction

codeSystems.name: NGFacilityTypeVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm HealthFacility Type VS
codeSystems.description: Classification of Nigerian health facilities

codeSystems.name: NGGenderVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
codeSystems.description: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

codeSystems.name: NGHivStatusVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Client HIV Status VS
codeSystems.description: Client HIV Status

codeSystems.name: NGLanguagesVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Languages VS
codeSystems.description: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

codeSystems.name: NGLGAsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm LGAs VS
codeSystems.description: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

codeSystems.name: NGOrganizationOwnerVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Location Owner
codeSystems.description: The owner of an Immunization location

codeSystems.name: NGPregnancyStatusVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Client Preganancy Status VS
codeSystems.description: Client Pregnancy Status

codeSystems.name: NGRelationshipsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Relationships VS
codeSystems.description: list of persons related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care.

codeSystems.name: NGSessionTypeVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Session Type VS
codeSystems.description: Type of session for immunization. Could be in a fixed facility, outreach or mobile.

codeSystems.name: NGSiblingHealthStatusVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status VS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines the health of the client's sibling

codeSystems.name: NGStatesVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm States VS
codeSystems.description: The state where a person or a facility is.

codeSystems.name: NGContraindicationVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Vaccine Contraindication VS
codeSystems.description: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

codeSystems.name: NGVaccineLibraryVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm VaccineLibrary VS
codeSystems.description: A curated list of vaccines recognized under Nigeria's national immunization program

codeSystems.name: NGWardsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Wards VS
codeSystems.description: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.
